title: Yestertime
description: Alternative cover edition of ASIN B08MZ7WQBW"I'm going to die a hundred years before I was born..."The handwritten note was in a dusty trunk that sat in a cave untouched for 150 years. What did the words mean? When journalist Ray Burton finds the trunk near the Arizona ghost town of Hollow Rock, his life changes in an instant.Something in the trunk shouldnâ€™t be there.This begins a dangerous journey of discovery bordering on the impossible. A discovery that will affect the past, the present, and the future.
author: Andrew  Cunningham
